subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Fernando Verdasco won his quarterfinal at the Pilot Pen event in New Haven, beating Mischa Zverev, 6-2, 7-6 (4). Verdasco, a Spaniard, said he was dedicating his victory to the 153 victims of the Spanair jet crash at Madrid’s Barajas Airport on Wednesday and their families. Verdasco, ranked No. 13 in the world, advanced to his fourth ATP Tour semifinal of the season and will next face eighth-seeded Mardy Fish, a 6-3, 7-6 (4) winner over Jesse Levine.
